title: Sewn Chaos Kalista

embed.description: Sewn Chaos Kalista, league of legends skin concept!Here's another render of one of my earlier sketches.

body: I did another thing, what do you think of it?

replies.body: Really cool idea! I did a concept for Sewn Chaos Kalista when we were deciding upon a launch skin for her. Btw it's really hard to design a skin for a champion before they are released because you can't play it and you're not sure how the community will perceive that champion.

Thank you for commenting! :D
